critical.title: Missing JWT Secret Key
critical.description: JWT_SECRET_KEY environment variable is not configured
critical.remediation: Set a cryptographically secure JWT secret (minimum 64 characters)

critical.title: Missing Webhook Signature Verification
critical.description: Webhooks may not verify signatures from external providers
critical.remediation: Implement HMAC signature verification for all webhooks

critical.title: Secrets in Repository
critical.description: Found 7 .env files that may contain secrets
critical.remediation: Remove .env files from repository and add to .gitignore

high.title: Database Connection Encryption Missing
high.description: Database connections may not be using SSL/TLS

medium.title: PII in Logs Risk
medium.description: No PII masking detected in logging configuration
medium.remediation: Implement log masking for sensitive fields (email, phone, etc.)

medium.title: Permissive CORS Configuration
medium.description: CORS may allow localhost or overly permissive origins
medium.remediation: Restrict CORS origins to production domains only

medium.title: Docker Running as Root
medium.description: Dockerfile may not configure non-root user
medium.remediation: Add USER directive to run container as non-root

info.title: Verify Backup Encryption
info.description: Manual verification needed for backup encryption
info.remediation: Ensure all backups are encrypted at rest and in transit

info.title: Verify Data Retention Policies
info.description: Manual verification needed for data retention policies
info.remediation: Document and implement data retention policies per compliance requirements

recommendations: URGENT: Address 3 critical security issues immediately
